original_text:
Diwinity
Dobbiamo dirlo, a noi le slot che utilizzano il tema degli antichi dei greci, piacciono un sacco. Ancor di più parlando di Diwinity, che secondo il nostro modesto parere, è una slot quasi perfetta: ha una bella grafica, mette a disposizione dei bonus interessantissimi che aumentano le possibilità di vincita, l’interfaccia è essenziale e quindi molto intuitiva.
Per quel che riguarda il comparto grafico, diciamo che tutti i simboli sono delle divinità (o comunque oggetti legati agli abitanti dell’Olimpo) e ricordano lo stile dei cartoni animati.
I rulli si muovono all’interno di una cornice sorretta da due colonne e con una fontana sullo sfondo. I pulsanti per far partire il gioco, per i giri automatici e quello per variare la puntata si trovano alla sinistra della griglia, quello per accedere al menù è sulla destra.
La musica dal tono epico è coinvolgente, ma se non vi piace comunque disattivabile dal menù.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Diwinity ha 20 linee di pagamento fisse posizionate su una griglia con 5 rulli e 3 righe. La scommessa minima parte da 0,01 € per linea, quindi ogni spin ci costa appena 0,20 €. Naturalmente si può aumentare la scommessa a piacimento, sino a un massimo di 60 € totali.
La volatilità è bassa, si vince spesso ma cifre non troppo alte, e il valore RTP è del 94,88 %.
Simboli e funzionalità di Diwinity
In totale, troviamo 14 simboli, 5 dei quali speciali. Partendo da quelli di minor valore, i primi che incontriamo sono Q, K e A. Subito dopo troviamo Artemide, la dea della caccia, Atena divinità della giustizia Apollo dio del sole, Venere dea della bellezza e Zeus, il padre degli dei.
Abbiamo ben due simboli Wild, rappresentati dal dio Dioniso e da Poseidone. Essi sostituiscono tutti i simboli, eccetto quelli speciali e se compaiono durante i Free Spin, rimarranno appiccicati durante i giri successivi.
Un altro simbolo speciale è lo Scatter Wild che trasforma alcuni simboli casuali in Wild.
Di tanto intanto può apparire uno o più moltiplicatori x2, con una vincita massima di 8x.
Lo scudo con l’immagine di Medusa è il simbolo Bonus. Quando compare, ci verrà chiesto di scegliere tra i Free Spin o il gioco Bonus. Quest’ultimo prevede la rottura di alcuni scudi per ricevere un premio in denaro.

raw_translation.response:
Diwinity

Let's face it, we love slot games that use the theme of ancient Greek gods. And when it comes to Diwinity, in our humble opinion, it's almost perfect: it has beautiful graphics, offers interesting bonuses that increase your chances of winning, and the interface is simple and intuitive.

Speaking of the graphics, all symbols are deities (or objects related to the inhabitants of Olympus) and resemble cartoon-style illustrations. The reels move inside a frame supported by two columns and with a fountain in the background. The buttons to start the game, for automatic spins, and to vary the bet are located on the left of the grid, while the one to access the menu is on the right.

The epic-toned music is engaging, but can be turned off from the menu if not to your liking.

Main features of the slot machine

Diwinity has 20 fixed paylines positioned on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet starts from €0.01 per line, so each spin costs just €0.20. Of course, you can increase the bet as you please, up to a maximum of €60 in total. The volatility is low, you win often but not too high, and the RTP value is 94.88%.

Symbols and features of Diwinity

Overall, there are 14 symbols, 5 of which are special. Starting with the lower-value ones, the first we encounter are Q, K, and A. Immediately after, we find Artemis, the goddess of hunting, Athena, the goddess of justice, Apollo, the god of the sun, Venus, the goddess of beauty, and Zeus, the father of the gods.

We have two Wild symbols, represented by the god Dionysus and Poseidon. They replace all symbols except for the special ones, and if they appear during the Free Spins, they will remain sticky during the subsequent spins.

Another special symbol is the Scatter Wild, which turns some random symbols into Wild. From time to time, x2 multipliers can appear, with a maximum win of 8x.

The shield with the image of Medusa is the Bonus symbol. When it appears, we will be asked to choose between Free Spins or the Bonus game. The latter involves breaking some shields to receive a cash prize.

Review: Diwinity Review

As a seasoned gambler, we must admit that we are a fan of slot games based on the ancient Greek gods theme, especially when it comes to Diwinity. According to our humble opinion, this slot is almost perfect – from its sleek graphics to its exciting bonus features that increase your chances of winning. The interface is essential and intuitive, which is a plus. 

In terms of graphics, all symbols are of gods (or objects related to the residents of Olympus) and resemble cartoon styles. The reels move within a frame supported by two columns and with a fountain in the background. The buttons to start the game, for automatic spins, and to vary the bet can be found on the left of the grid, and the menu button is on the right. 

The music with its epic tone is engaging and immersive and can be deactivated from the menu.

Key features: Diwinity has 20 fixed paylines positioned on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet starts from 0.01 € per line, which means that each spin costs only 0.20 €. Of course, you can increase the bet as you please, up to a maximum of 60 € Total. The volatility is low, inviting frequent wins with modest figures, and the RTP value is 94.88%.

Symbols and functions of Diwinity: In total, we found 14 symbols, five of which are special. Starting from the lowest-valued symbols, we see Q, K, and A. Immediately after that, we have Artemis, the goddess of hunting; Athena, the deity of justice; Apollo, the sun god; Venus, the goddess of beauty; and Zeus, the godfather of the gods.

We have two Wild symbols, represented by Dionysus and Poseidon, respectively. They replace all symbols except the special ones, and if they appear during Free Spins, they will remain stuck during subsequent spins. 

Another special symbol is the Wild Scatter that turns some random symbols into Wild. From time to time, we can also come across one or more x2 multipliers, with a maximum win of 8x.

The shield with the image of Medusa is the Bonus symbol. When it appears, we will be prompted to choose between Free Spins or the Bonus game. The latter involves breaking some shields to receive cash prizes.

Experience the allure of Diwinity and immerse yourself in the world of the gods for your chance to win big!

Review:
 
Game Overview

Diwinity is a slot game based on the ancient Greek gods theme with 20 fixed paylines, 5 reels, and 3 rows. The minimum bet starts from 0.01 € per line, and the game offers two Wild symbols, Wild Scatter, and a Bonus symbol with a choice between Free Spins or the Bonus game.

Graphics and Interface

Diwinity's graphics are sleek and consist of cartoon-style symbols that depict gods or objects related to the residents of Olympus. The reels move within a frame supported by two columns with a fountain in the background. The buttons for starting the game, automatic spins, and varying the bet can be found on the left, and the menu button is on the right. The music is an epic soundtrack that can be deactivated from the menu.

Key Features

Diwinity has a low volatility that invites frequent wins with modest figures, and the RTP value is 94.88%. The game offers a minimum bet of 0.01 € per line and a maximum of 60 € Total. The game's Wild symbols represented by Dionysus and Poseidon replace all symbols except the special ones, and if they appear during Free Spins, they remain stuck during subsequent spins. Another special symbol is the Wild Scatter that turns some random symbols into Wild. We can also come across one or more x2 multipliers, with a maximum win of 8x.

Symbols and Functions

There are 14 symbols in Diwinity, including five special ones. The lowest-valued symbols are Q, K, and A. The higher-valued symbols are Artemis, the goddess of hunting; Athena, the deity of justice; Apollo, the sun god; Venus, the goddess of beauty; and Zeus, the godfather of the gods. The shield with Medusa's image is the Bonus symbol, prompting the player to choose between Free Spins or the Bonus game.

Bonus Features

Diwinity offers two bonus features. The first are Free Spins, activated when the Bonus symbol appears during the base game. The player is rewarded with up to 10 Free Spins, during which the Wild symbols remain stuck. The second bonus feature is the Bonus game, which is triggered when the player chooses it after landing the Bonus symbol. In the Bonus game, the player breaks shields to receive cash prizes.
